ModMetaData.name: Belhuns Learning - Plague Gun
ModMetaData.author: Belhun
ModMetaData.description: V1.0 This mod adds a plague gun, a weapon that has a chance to give your enemies the plague. This is a Test mod for me to make sure i know the basic's of modding Rimworld. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=33219.msg338629#msg338629 if you are intrested in learning too
